trans-unit.source: Represents the margins for various chart elements.
trans-unit.target: Representa as margens de vários elementos do gráfico.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"></xref> class with the specified top, bottom, left and right coordinates of the margin.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"> </xref> classe com o especificado superior, inferior, coordenadas esquerdas e direita da margem.

trans-unit.source: When used for legend cells, the margins are measured as a percentage of the legend's font size.
trans-unit.target: Quando usado para células de legenda, as margens são medidas como uma porcentagem do tamanho da fonte da legenda.

trans-unit.source: Top margin.
trans-unit.target: Margem superior.

trans-unit.source: Bottom margin.
trans-unit.target: Margem inferior.

trans-unit.source: Left margin.
trans-unit.target: Margem esquerda.

trans-unit.source: Right margin.
trans-unit.target: Margem direita.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the bottom margin.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a margem inferior.

trans-unit.source: When used for legend cells, the margins are measured as a percentage of the legend's font size.
trans-unit.target: Quando usado para células de legenda, as margens são medidas como uma porcentagem do tamanho da fonte da legenda.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é 0.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current object.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o objeto especificado é igual ao objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current object.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser comparado com o objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the specified object is equal to the current object, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>Se o objeto especificado é igual ao objeto atual, caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the hash code for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o código hash para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the hash code for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> valor que representa o código hash para um <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the margins are empty.
trans-unit.target: Determina se as margens estão vazias.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if all margins values are zero, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>Se todos os valores de margens forem zero, caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the left margin.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a margem esquerda.

trans-unit.source: When used for legend cells, the margins are measured as a percentage of the legend's font size.
trans-unit.target: Quando usado para células de legenda, as margens são medidas como uma porcentagem do tamanho da fonte da legenda.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the right margin.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a margem direita.

trans-unit.source: When used for legend cells, the margins are measured as a percentage of the legend's font size.
trans-unit.target: Quando usado para células de legenda, as margens são medidas como uma porcentagem do tamanho da fonte da legenda.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the top margin.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a margem superior.

trans-unit.source: When used for legend cells, the margins are measured as a percentage of the legend's font size.
trans-unit.target: Quando usado para células de legenda, as margens são medidas como uma porcentagem do tamanho da fonte da legenda.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é 0.

trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"></xref> object to a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Converte um <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"> </xref> o objeto para um <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A [RectangleF](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) object that has margins.
trans-unit.target: Um [RectangleF](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) objeto que tem as margens.

trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"></xref> object to its <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> representation.
trans-unit.target: Converte um <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"> </xref> o objeto para a sua <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> representação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents this object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> valor que representa esse objeto.
